cause.description:
From July 1st to July 31st Canadians are going to be collecting Tim Horton's Gift Certificates and writing a note to a random soldier on the back and sending them to the Military Family Resource Center in Toronto. They will make sure they get to the base in Kandahar where there is a Tim Hortons Located.
If you want to check out the Face Book Group for this we have 16,200 members in 7 weeks: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2356701626
We have our own website : Http://Coffee4ourtroops.com
Have been featured on CityTV News International: http://www.citynews.ca/international/day/5-28-2007.aspx
Address To Send your certificates too: MILITARY FAMILY RESOURCE CENTER C/O Susan Tom - Tim Hortons for the troops 5 Yukon Lane Toronto, ON M3k 0A1
1. Position #1
cause.mission: Make A Soldiers Day A Little brighter by sending them a taste of home
cause.name: Tim Hortons For Our Troops
